import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { showSubMenu = false; toggleMenu() { const menu = document.querySelector('.navbar-menu'); menu.classList.toggle('show'); } showMenu(){ this.showSubMenu = !this.showSubMenu; console.log(this.showSubMenu) } }
